show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Relational Being
content: A conversation with Kenneth Gergen, author of Relational Being: Beyond Self and Community, about escaping our received... <!--more--> concept of “the bound self” and realizing that we are selves constituted of and by relationship; on decision-making as coordinating relational dynamics; on conflict resolution as building relational bridges among multiple moralities; on the Taos Institute he heads to spread relational insights to various professions and grassroots groups [taosinstitute.net]; poem by Seamus Heaney
